event.name: BadChecksum
event.format_string: Bad checksum value during receipt of file %s: computed 0x%08X, read 0x%08X
event.comment: During receipt of a file, the computed checksum value did not match the stored value

event.name: FileOpenError
event.comment: An error occurred opening a file

event.name: FileReceived
event.comment: The File Uplink component successfully received a file

event.name: FileWriteError
event.comment: An error occurred writing to a file

event.name: InvalidReceiveMode
event.comment: The File Uplink component received a packet with a type that was invalid for the current receive mode

arg.name: packetType
arg.comment: The type of the packet received

event.name: PacketOutOfBounds
event.format_string: Packet %u out of bounds for file %s
event.comment: During receipt of a file, the File Uplink component encountered a packet with offset and size out of bounds for the current file

arg.name: packetIndex
arg.comment: The sequence index of the packet

event.name: PacketOutOfOrder
event.comment: The File Uplink component encountered an out-of-order packet during file receipt

arg.name: packetIndex
arg.comment: The sequence index of the out-of-order packet

arg.name: lastPacketIndex
arg.comment: The sequence index of the last packet received before the out-of-order packet

event.name: UplinkCanceled
event.comment: The File Uplink component received a CANCEL packet

event.name: DecodeError
event.format_string: Unable to decode file packet. Status: %d

arg.name: status
arg.comment: The sequence index of the out-of-order packet
